website_summaries.verdict: The halter neck and mesh front paired with the cutout back will give you a bit of a Bond girl look.
pros: The ruched tummy is flattering, while the cut gives you a sexy look without baring a lot
Comes in multiple colors and patterns with various pricing, as well as plus sizes
cons: Sizes are small, medium, large etc
rather than numbered dress sizes, so getting the right fit can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Check the size measurements and choose according to what they say!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! I’m headed to a cruise with my husband and another couple and was looking for suits that made me feel sexy without looking like a fool. This suit totally did it for me! I checked the dimensions and ordered accordingly, perfect fit (Ordered a 0X/14W - I’m 5’9 and 200 pounds)! I can’t wait to prance around the ship while throwing back margaritas with my crew!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: XL top) I loved the mesh and it fit great (not a fan ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL which is my normal size (Size 16 dress, XL top) I loved the mesh and it fit great (not a fan of the cups but they are removable)! It had great support and looked cute! It was a bit tough to get on because of the key hole (?) back but fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, perfect bathing suit to feel pretty and be conservative.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. It's equally conservative yet I feel beautiful in it. I was looking for something that I could wear to the water park or beach with the kids but I didn't want a typical plain bathing suit. I am 5'7, 140 lbs and a size 4/6pants, D chest. I bought a medium and fits perfect, not too tight or loose. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON SPADE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect one piece!
customer_reviews.text: Review from Hannah: This suit is perfect! I look terrible in one pieces, always have! I wanted something that was modest yet looked a little sexy, I’ll be drinking (a lot) on our honeymoon cruise next month and don’t want to show anything on accident if I happen to get too drunk lol I’m 5”5, 165lbs, 38 bust, 31 waist, and 42 hips and the large was perfect for me! My thighs are huge, so usually one pieces dig into them, but this one fits them perfect! I also have a very long torso, so the fact this fit me long wise was a win in itself!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, wish had more boob support too but it could have been much worse! It was tight enough to give some body shaping support, quality material, and covered in all the right places. Very satisfied!! Much better quality and fit than more expensive suits that I've bought at popular brick & mortar retail stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted a medium but they only had small at the time for prime so I went with the small. I'm 5'4 125 pounds. It was a little tight but now that I have worn it a lot it feels better I love it so much! Wish they had more colors. I doesn't cover my butt so well but I always wear swim shorts over it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and sexy no matter your size
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this suit. I am 5’3” and usually wear a size 14-16, needless to say, bathing suits are not usually my friend. I feel like a goddess in this suit. I can’t imagine it’s great for serious swimming, but it is perfect for enjoying the hot tub or lounging at the beach 😍
customer_reviews.author: Jesse & Flanny

customer_reviews.title: Well made, very flattering fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the S size. I am 5’3”, 126 lbs, 34c, size 4 top, 6 pants and this is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’ 8”, 210 lbs. My measurements are 40-42-52. I am between a D-cup & DD-cup. I wear a size 18-20 in most clothing lines, and I have an “apple” body shape. I ordered this suit in a size 16. It is huge from the rib cage up. There is no breast support at all, and the top half hangs off, or gapes open, where it meets both arm pits. The bottom (waist/stomach area) fits ok. This is not flattering on me, and I am dissapointed with the purchase. Even in the correct size, which I can’t begin to guess what is, the lack of breast support is a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Meranda J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I recently gained 20lbs and was depressed about swimsuit shopping. Loved how so many women sent their pictures in and every one of them looked amazing in this suit so decided to order it. Love love it and I’m now confident enough to wear this on a upcoming cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't post pictures, but I love this swimsuit. I'm a size 16/18, 38DDD bra & ordered a 1x. It's flattering. No gaping anywhere. Fits snug, but not tight. For the price, this is one of the best suits I've ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: Cute design but major flaw
customer_reviews.text: The overall design of this swimsuit is very cute, but someone needs to work on the cups! They are made of a VERY firm material and are large and perfectly round, so they stand out (literally) in the silky swimsuit material. It makes the wearer look like something out of a mid-90s Madonna video, or like you have a pair of targets on your chest. Swapping the current cups out for a softer foam (like in every other swimsuit I’ve ever worn) would solve the problem. I was sad to return it because the swimsuit is really cute and fit great - but there is just no way!
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bathing suit at first, BUT only wore it about 3-4 times and now the thin lace on the front and sides are ripping. Coming apart, strings coming out on the lace. So, a waste of money to only be able to wear it a few times. I have paced the return window since I bought it 1 month before the summer started.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Great Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised as I had gone suit shopping at several different stores, and couldn't find anything that I liked. This fit perfectly as expected, and is very comfortable to hang out at the beach with my 3 kids. I am about 5'4 and 145 lbs and the medium was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K Martez

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Piece
customer_reviews.text: I am really fussy when it comes to bathing suits. But this one is really comfortable. Im 150 pounds and i ordered a large. I may have been able to get away with a medium but to avoid my boobs falling out the sides and to get full butt coverage i decided to take the large. I wore the bathing suit as a body suit to a party paired with some culottes and i think it lookes great. A very versatile piece.
customer_reviews.author: Candita

customer_reviews.title: "Are you looking at my bum? Cheeky monkey."
customer_reviews.text: I am understanding exactly what a few reviewers meant when they said it was a bit "cheeky" now. I'm about 5'6" 147 lbs. I ordered a medium. The suit does look and feel great, however I had to return because when I clasped the neck in the back it was a little too tight around my neck at my throat and didn't seem like it would be comfortable to swim in. I know me and I would have also spent a lot of time pulling it over my butt cheeks. I have considered ordering a large to see if it makes a difference with those issues because I do really love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders for my cleavage! Beautiful swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Quite a beautiful bathing suit. I really loved how the chest/neck fit. While I believe the L would have had better tummy control, the XL fit perfectly in the chest area giving me the best cleavage I've had in a while. :) I actually purchased an XL and an L since Chinese-made clothing sometimes doesn't fit me as expected; planning to return the one that didn't fit...but since I'm still losing weight and love this swimsuit so much, I'm going to keep the smaller size for when I lose more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Reyneke

customer_reviews.title: Great flattering suit for th price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bathing suit. It covers well, hides back fat and all the squishy places in the front. I got a size 16. I wear a 14 pant at Lane Bryant and most places. The fabric isn't the best. It feels fine but this suit probably won't last through next year. It is nice though and I am glad I took the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Talley

customer_reviews.title: Good but short on me.  My dimensions below.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I'm 5'4", 39.5/29/38. It fit well everywhere but was a tad too short in length so the collar dug into my collar bones a little. I don't think I could've sized up. This size large would fit someone with similar dimensions but who has a little less weight, bust, curves, length (whatever) than me. It almost worked but the other suit I ordered was way more comfortable because of the length issue so I'm returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: OhSoChewey

customer_reviews.title: Great style and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The suit fits well and looks stylish with the low keyhole back and the see-though mesh in front.. Still lots of coverage I'm 76 years old and considered buying a swim dress for more coverage. I'm so glad I tried this one as it is perfect and looks so much more in style but doesn't make me feel self conscious. The neck band is a little tricky to fasten, but doable. I bought the black for a more slimming look. If you've priced swim suits at other sites, you know that this is a great price. All in all, it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Sexy , mom approved
customer_reviews.text: Very sexy n mom approved, this fits great as expected, I got XL I'm a size 11 38 D , it's good quality thick material one of my top 3 bathing suits this summer, the sheer is awesome the sheer is front in the bust area and the back , I love it! The folded material in the front does its job hides the belly fat lol it's an awesome bathing suit
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hesitantly. I hate buying swim suites online. This was a great surprise! I looks great on and is super comfortable. I loved it so much I immediately got on and bought another in a different color! This from someone who tries on 20 suites a year. Has a mini break down then settles on one. Lol. I am 5'4 with athletic build curvy. So it's hard finding things that are flattering
customer_reviews.author: ANRamsey

customer_reviews.title: Most flattering bathing suit I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is modern retro. It's classy, sophisticated, and still sexy. I'm very flat chested with a petite frame and a slightly curvy thigh and but area, so one pieces don't always work for me. WOW this is close to perfect on me! My one complaint is that there isn't more butt coverage. If you're curvy or have a large caboose it might ride up too much. Other than that I absolutely recommend it! The price is incredible for what you get. This is one of those things that flatters a variety of figures.
customer_reviews.author: Cini

customer_reviews.title: I'm one that is pretty picky about my swimsuits as I am a plus ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 16, weigh 210lbs. I ordered a 1x and it fit me perfectly. I'm one that is pretty picky about my swimsuits as I am a plus sized women and I don't like all my goods hanging out. I loved the back part as it covered my back fat and the front sheer area made my chest look great. It was more like a sports fit which made me feels comfortable because I have an athletic build body. I plan to purchase more in different colors, this is the type of fit I've been looking for and even my husband loves it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bush

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathing suit! I’ve always had a hard time finding something comfortable and this one was perfect. I wore it to the spa and went between the steam room, sauna, hot tub and a mineral pool and didn’t once feel uncomfortable a bit. There are 2 layers in the middle so one is tight and holds everything in while the top layer keeps it from suctioning to you when getting out of the water. Loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sml2015

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for a 1piece suit!
customer_reviews.text: Based off the size chart, I felt safe with the Medium because I am usually a true medium and never have an issue with that size. I’m actually underweight at the moment, so I figured it would be a little big and I could move back into my normal weight without issue. But the Medium was actually really tight on my smaller than medium body... so I returned it and ordered the Large. Much better fit. The style is pretty and flattering and I’m a huge fan of this swimsuit- just be cautious about the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Bathing suit rides up in back! Not made for petite women
customer_reviews.text: At 5ft and 140llbs I wanted a bathing suit with ruching/pleats for the middle of waist and stomach. Well, I was quite surprised of how well it fit me in the front! Very flattering! However, the back was awful!! The backside did not fit me properly! My butt cheeks were hanging out! And I am a small petite woman! Had to return! I think suit is made for taller women not 5ft petite women!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this suit and love it. It’s super cute on and comfortable. I am going to share my size and pics because I used the reviews and pics of other women to purchase this suit. I am 5’6” and about 200lbs and wear a 34DD to 36DD so hopefully that will help you in choosing a new swimsuit that makes you happy. My husband really liked this on me. I like that it has full coverage with a little sexy thrown in. I will be keeping this one. I haven’t worn this outside or to water so we shall see. It’s easy to pull on and take off also the buckle is super easy to reach! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: In general happy with this suit, for around $25. I ordered the 1X and I'm around a size 16-18. I would say there was a little buldge in the back area, above the suit material, but it was disguised by the mesh. The back is a little unusual and so I probably won't get a lot of sun in this suit but it is certainly pretty, and something different to add to the rotation.
customer_reviews.author: jsharp13

customer_reviews.title: Sexy and swimwable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Cancun getaway.. very very sexy and flattering. The back come high up and the dreaded “back fat” that some bathing suits cause are curved with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaRN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Suit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lost a lot of weight recently and have some stretch marks from my previous weight gain. This suit covers the areas I’m self-conscious about AND is super flattering on my stomach. I have a little pooch and the combination of the black color and “ruching” on this suit really slims down the pooch. I cannot say better things about this suit quality and fit. For reference, I’m 5’8” and I weigh 154 lbs and I got a Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: If you’re an apple-shaped person who struggles to find flattering suits, check this one out!
customer_reviews.text: As an apple-shaped individual, I carry a lot of my extra weight in my midsection, which is something I can work with in terms of regular apparel, but it’s a real challenge with swimwear. Based on the reviews, I had medium-high hopes for the fit of this particular suit on my shape. My expectations were exceeded! Somehow it gives the illusion of a waist, and it accentuates one of my favorite features, my shoulders. It’s modest without being matronly or fussy, and the little cleavage panel adds a lot without making me feel worried about nip slips. For reference, I’m 5’2”, 200 lbs, and I ordered the 1X/16W, and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and super flattering! Better than my expensive suits!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! This suit fits better than many of my bathing suits that cost over $100! It is comfortable and fits everywhere well. I have nurses three babies and it even holds my boobies in a good position. The wine red color is very nice. I love that I don’t feel hoochy but still attractive and can still play with my kids without a nip slip or being self conscious of my mummy tummy. FYI - I’m 5’8, 183 lbs and wearing an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Barber

customer_reviews.title: Sheer mesh showing signs of wear after less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: What a shame!!!! This suit is lovely on and it handles my DD boobs with ease and it’s comfortable BUT I have worn it 4 times and only hand washed it and the sheer mesh is starting to show severe signs of wear as if I have had it years! And of course no return option at this point.
customer_reviews.author: spring

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this suit. I hate swim suit shopping in general, let alone online, but I took a chance! I feel AMAZING in this suit! I never say that about a swim suit! The style is so complimentary of my body type. Modest, yet super attractive! I am usually a med to large in tops (34DD), smaller on the bottom. I ordered a large and it was perfect. I seriously love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: E Hanna

customer_reviews.title: OMG it smelled so bad!!
customer_reviews.text: It smelled like cigarettes... as soon as I opened the bag the smell slapped me on the face. The most disgusting thing that ever happened to me on an amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to all the bloggers out there that think this suit is the bomb. What a disappointment! Do not waste your time. Cheaply made, this suit sounds like it was ripping apart at the seams just trying it on. I’m 5’3”and bought a Medium and the torso was so short, I could hardly get the clasp to fit at my neck! Not sure how anyone tall could wear it. I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large and I am 5'7 195lbs hour glass shape, 36DD and normally wear large in shirts and 14 in jeans. I have a mommy tummy and natural mom boobs so I need support everywhere. This swimsuit hold everything in and makes the girls look good,I do like a fully bottom but my 15 yr old and 24 yrs old girls tell me that full bottoms are for old people lol, I'm 42 so I dont wanna look old. I feel an XL may fit my butt better but I am keeping the Large cause my kids are pretty honest and they say I look hot lol.
customer_reviews.author: Love To Shop

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Classy, and Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I almost never order a one-piece, but decided to give this a try with so many great reviews. I'm 5'4", 145 pounds and on the cusp of a medium or large according to the size chart. I ordered a large according to the hip measurement because I'm pear-shaped, which turned out to be the right choice. This suit is well-constructed and the style is extremely flattering. The sheer panels give the suit a little extra visual interest and sex appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: I love this swim suit it was a little big on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim suit it was a little big on me though im 5'2 and I weigh 205 I recently lost 45lbs and I wanted to get a swimsuit that was sexy but still had some coverage for our honey moon my husband loved it. I just wish I would have purchased a smaller size 0X
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Figure flattering!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit! I typically wear tankinis to hide my post-baby belly but I always kinda feel they’re not very sexy or flattering. I took a chance based on all the positive reviews and I was not disappointed. I’m 5’5”, 165 and typically wear a size 12 or women’s large. I bought the lg and it fits great. I’m going to have to buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Davis

customer_reviews.title: If you are "close" on size measurements, go a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and nice quality. I am a mix of the listed XL & XL-Plus sizes and had ordered the XL. It was too "short", making it very difficult to fasten the hook at the back, and very uncomfortable once I did. This actually helped my evaluation, because the mesh (which I thought would rip easily, withstood the tight fitting AND the suit looked super cute! Great color. I returned (very smooth process) and reordered the XL-Plus. I love it. I would say if you have questions/concerns about size, go a size up and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choker collar. cute but chokey
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big girl in denial and bought a large. Fit somewhat small. HOWEVER, I gain and lose weight frequently so I'm not going to judge the product on it. The neck part was a bit chokey, and the material left my skin a little red, however, this can go back to the small size problem which was my mistake. Keep in mind you might not need a size up, swimsuits are usually stretchy and you can probably get away with a Large if you run a size 12-14.
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Stumbled across this suit after searching. I’m always skeptical when it comes to buying clothes online but I’m glad I made this purchase and I totally mean that! I am 5’4” and weigh 185. I wear a large T-shirt but ordered an XL. I was looking for something to support my chest because I breastfeed so I need the extra support and nothing to fall out of my top. Was also looking for a suit with a comfortable fit in the abdominal area and this suit is just that. This swimsuit does it for me, and it’s also very flattering!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Who would have thought?
customer_reviews.text: Up until the age of about 48 I was in rocking shape. I exercised 6 days a week and had draconian control over my diet. Well then, menopause and a diagnosis of Hashimoto's Disease torpedoed my waistline and my energy. I'm considerably heavier now that I am 56. All the years I was a skinny minny and I never found the right swimsuit. I always felt incredibly self conscious. Who would have thought a $30 swimsuit from Amazon would look so freaking fabulous on me? I mean, I would not be ashamed to go out in public in this. I am 5' and 4" and I would guess I weigh 160 or 170 now, and L is PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. SlatteryTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about this suit
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this suit! It’s super flattering in the front. I wish it had a tad more booty coverage. I usually wear a large for my chest and booty, and while the large does fit, I feel like I’m in between L and XL. I’m sticking with the L because the straps and front fit very well. Not sure if going up a size would give me the coverage I’m looking for in the booty. 5’7” and 160 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Too short in the torso
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this like so many other reviewers...but it just wasn't long enough in the torso or cut quite generously enough to cover my (ample) rear. I'm 5' 7", 145 lbs and pear shaped with a long torso. Am sending back because I think I would constantly be dealing with a wedgie. I'm also not very large chested..so the front mesh panel and styling wasn't doing much for me. I think on a different body type this suit would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: I needed a modest swimsuit for overseas living. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit. Fit me perfectly. I took the removal cups out. It works better for me without the cups. Otherwise this is a good quality suit. Good modest cut yet very attractive on. I followed the measurement guidelines and comments on reviews and decided and this size fit me perfectly. I am 5'0 tall 120 pounds. I have a 32D cup.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Hands down— best mom-friendly suit!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST SUIT I HAVE EVER OWNED. I bought it expecting to be another FLOP after buying several other suits this summer that are mom-friendly. I needed something that a) hides my belly and b) has a high neck so my toddler could stop flashing my boobs to the world when I’m holding her in the water. This suit is so comfortable and so flattering. I love the mesh on the chest and the back— it’s very simple! I am 5’2”, 150 lbs, and I got a large.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute and fit great...however it ripped as soon as i put it on... ot becaise it didnt fit but because its cheaply made and i am sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The suit is flattering, believe the hype. Doesn’t cover very large chests.
customer_reviews.text: The fit on the body is very flattering. However if you are particularly well endowed like me (38 G) there is spillage on the side or smashed boob in the middle. The neck also pulls down. However I am keeping it because it holds in my back fat and is one of the best suits I can find for lap swimming regardless of the flaws. I understand I’m in the minority with my chest size so it still gets 4 stars. At least I don’t have to worry about a boob popping out. #bigboobproblems
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Classy and well fitted
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! I've recently put on some weight and feel self conscious in a bathing suit. At the pool I'll normally just wear workout clothes because I haven't found a flattering one yet. But I'm taking a beach vacation and wanted to look presentable in pictures. I ordered red and normally wear a size 12 in jeans. This suit fits great and perhaps if anything a little loose. Especially in the chest area but I'm a B cup at most. I'll be ordering in more colors for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The top of this suit was really cute and fit well but the leg cut and butt coverage of the suit I got was not the same as the image. I wear a 26 jean and ordered a size small. The image shows a lower cute leg opening and decent bottom coverage. The suit I received had a high cut leg and very little butt coverage; my cheeks were falling out and it started to go up my crack a bit. I can’t be worrying about my butt showing when I’m running around chasing my kids. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering
customer_reviews.text: Loving this new suit. I am a 12 bottom, medium/large top and got the large (12-14). The suit fits perfectly through the top and waist and is snug, but not overly so, through the hips. I feel like it might be a little too snug if I was a 14. The bottom does a nice job smoothing out my stomach and the top is really flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for large chests
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered a lot of swim suits from amazon and this is the only one I’ve kept. The butt part is not too cheeky but also not fully covered like I’m 80 years old. Perfect amount of coverage. The chest part is just sheer enough for a bit of sexy cleavage but doesn’t make me feel inappropriate. The material is great. For reference, I am 145 lbs, 5’5” and have a 34DD chest and I ordered a medium. It’s hard to find a suit for bigger chests that don’t leave you hanging out. This is the one! I love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Erika V

customer_reviews.title: If you have a long torso don't get this.......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small and medium but both were too short length wise..... I am 5'9'' and 140 lbs...... I do have a long torso and I decided to take the plunge and order these suits.... I ordered both small and medium because I couldn't decide which one would fit best.... I got them both in the mail today and unfortunately needing to return both since they don't fit. I do have a long torso so if you are questioning it and on the taller side I would suggest keep hunting for another suit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! I gained some weight recently and hated how my swimsuits looked. We’re going to try to go to the beach next week and I needed something that made me feel good. This suit is perfect! It fit nicely in the stomach without drawing attention to it and looks really cute. I’m small chested, especially for my weight, and it didn’t gap like so many other suits do. I’m going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: today4ulove

customer_reviews.title: Put this in your cart ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this suit! Awesome purchase for the price! I ordered the XL and love it. I’m normally a size 14 in clothes. For reference I’m 5’0, 165 lbs and wear a 38H bra. I was really worried this couldn’t support me enough and I was really surprised! If it weren’t for my bust I probably would have ordered the 14 for a little more compression on my belly. But overall I’m very happy with the fit. Don’t pass up on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Runs too large.
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a medium. I read the size chart carefully before ordering. The swimsuit is very soft, pretty and comfortable. It just seems like it’s either used, worn or stretched too much. It runs too large on my hips and breasts. Even though it should fit as expected. I emailed the seller they said they will look into the size chart. Overall I’m not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a swimsuit online before because it's so difficult to find a swimsuit that fits right and covers problem areas. Since this got so many good reviews, and it's returnable I ordered it. Love it! I'm actually surprised, I feel comfortable in it but also still sexy. It's slimming. I am 5ft 4in, 145 lbs and usually wear a medium. I ordered a large, it's just a bit too big but i'm keeping it and when I order another (which I will) I will get the medium to compare the size. So happy with this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: great suit
customer_reviews.text: Lovely colour, fits nicely. I am 5'8" 140lbs, usually wear a size 6 but I have a big bust and a LONG torso so I have to size up significantly in bathing suits so I don't get cut in half. I bought the large and it fit really nicely. It was plenty long enough, maybe even a little roomy on the top which is not a bad thing because who wants squished boobies? My kids thought it was really nice and my husband loves it. I haven't had it for long enough to comment on how long it's going to last but for an upcoming getaway I'm really pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: MTFF

customer_reviews.title: Too small for H cup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying lots of suits and can’t find anything non-underwire for my 36H nursing bust. I’m 5’5” 153 and ordered an XL. The chest was too small to cover well, not supportive on the sides, and came with funny little circles of padding that made my breasts look misshapen. The rest of the suit was a bit too baggy. I can see why so many people love this suit though - the quality seems great and the style would be flattering on someone less endowed than I am at the moment. Maybe when I’m back to DD I will give it another try in a L, but for now it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: C. Teleki

customer_reviews.title: Great suit- flattering and fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not buy one piece suits; I just don’t like them. My friend had this suit and it looked fantastic on her so I thought I’d give it a try. I am 5’6”, 140 lbs and a 34DD, usually size 8 and I ordered this suit in a medium. This suit looks and fits great! I was so surprised! I feel that it has good support uptop and some ruching to help disguise my tummy issues. Color has held up fine in chlorine pools so far. So happy I took a chance on this suit!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I typically do not write reviews, but feel obligated for y’all in this instance. I bought a black one last summer, and the leopard one this year. These are THE BEST swimsuits ever. Super flattering, ( even for this double c-section mom belly), is appropriate for all you mamas ( you know what I mean), and still looks sexy. My husband says these are his favorite on me, coverage in all the right areas, and you do not have to keep tugging on anything to make sure your goodies stay in place. I think true to size, I noticed other reviewers say to size up, but for me my normal size is perfect. Buy this ladies, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: This suit really does live up to the hype. I bought it in black. The style really is flattering for my 5’7, 40C chest, 238 pound body. I’ve been wearing swim dresses for the past couple of years because I don’t feel comfortable with the way my legs look in regular suits. While I’m still self conscious about my inner thighs, this suit fits very nicely and the style is very flattering. I would be comfortable walking around the pool in it. I’m looking forward to packing this for my Kauai vacation in August.
customer_reviews.author: Shemaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great suit except for the cups
customer_reviews.text: The swimming suit fits exactly as I expected. The breast cups, however, are the smallest cups I have ever had in a swimsuit. I order the plus size, but the cups were maybe an A cup. This makes the suit fit really weird in the breast panels with an very odd shaped 'bump' on your boob. I will probably keep the suit and wear it when no one will see me because it's comfortable, but it's the strangest thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lovegrove

customer_reviews.title: very strange fit. because of the closure around the ...
customer_reviews.text: very strange fit. because of the closure around the neck it is sewn very narrowly making a tight fit to get over your hips unless you are quite small.
customer_reviews.author: BJP in Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Add to your cart!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a large through and through, and this swimsuit was super true to size. I’m 6 ft. and I have a long torso which makes finding tops/bodysuits/swimsuits that fit that hard to find. This bathing suit however had PLENTY of length and give, and fit like a glove. I was so impressed with both the quality of the material (which held up just fine in the water) and with the fit of the suit. The price was unbelievably reasonable. This was a great purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size large. I am 5 foot 3.5 inches tall. I weigh 145lbs and am athletically shaped (bigger hips, smaller bust). I currently wear a size 6 or 8 depending on the brand for bottoms and smalls/4 for tops (36/B). I wanted a bathing sure that was a bit camouflaged in the belly area because I have IBD and sometimes get this 3-5month prego bloated look. I also wanted to a cute, but sleek, one piece for swimming at the gym. I ordered a sun hat and a cute sheer black sarong to use on the beach! For the money, this is so cute without looking matronly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Amabile

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great price for a bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit simply because of all the reviews it had and my need for more bathing suits in general! I was not disappointed! You couldn't get this swimsuit for the price at any other store locally. It's great quality and very flattering. I am a 38DD and typically wear a 12/14 dress size. I ordered a 1X knowing that most bathing suits are a bit on the tight side and this fits perfectly! It's comfortable and not too revealing, but also not too conservative either! I may order another color too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size up, great for tall girls!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect swim suit. I hate wearing swim wear but this one covers and hugs the right areas and still looks sexy and stylish. Love, and will buy again in other colors. I’m 5’9’ long torso. Was perfect in the torso area. I usually wear 12-14 in pants and L/XL in tops. 38D. I bought the XL(US16) and it was perfect. I wouldn’t of gone any smaller or it would of been too tight. Also, the Navy is slightly darker than the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fanny Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I really like this swim suit. As an older, almost 60 year old woman, style and coverage is important to me. I love this style. It is flattering and functional for swimming or sunning. Received several compliments. It hides any back fat lines you may have the high waist was perfect for slimming. If there was one issue that could be improved upon, it was the fanny coverage. It does not cover the entire back side. It's not as bad as some but just so you know, It does not come all the way around the buttock like full coverage panties. more along the lines of French cut. It is a great suit overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Fit amazing. Made me feel great. Got so many compliments. I’m 5ft and wear between a med large and I got a med. it was great. Made my mom boobs look very nice haha. Just a bummer it didn’t last long. After the 3rd wear it started to look like a 10 year old bathing suit. Stretched out. All white specks everywhere. So upsetting. So if you’re just wanting it for one time use it’s perfect. If you wanted a bathing suit you feel good in for the summer DONT BUY. I washed on gentle cycle cold and hung dried. This shouldn’t happen. It’s made from cheap material apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing suit but no liner on the backside.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this product a Five star review because it fits so well. However I will never understand why suit companies like this line the front and not the back. If that doesn’t bother you then it’s an amazing suit. It’s perfect for me in every other way. I wear a size 30 bottoms and wear a 36 DD bra. It held me in all the right places to look great. I never feel comfortable in swimsuits but I absolutely felt confident about how I looked in this one. I love how the material in the front bunches to make a curvy girl feel comfortable and confident.
customer_reviews.author: Lpetry

customer_reviews.title: But it you won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 60 years old and bought this sit bc I'm not ready to go into the big flowered suits. As a retired female Marine and former track and field coach, I've stayed in shape and this bathing suit is flattering. The legs aren't high cut bc I won't use a high cut but this reminds me of the old Marilyn Monroe bathing suits she used to pose in. l feel younger in it without looking like "Too Much" for my age. I bought two, one in black and one in safe green or what I call military green. This suit can compete with my Ralph Lauren bathing suit that I paid almost $200.00.
customer_reviews.author: GySgt Maria USMC

customer_reviews.title: Torn up
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is adorable, and the fit is exactly as expected, but the mesh is ripped at the seam along one side. About 2 inches of it are torn. Definitely lacking quality control. As much as I love its design, I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J May Chag

customer_reviews.title: Really cute - size down.
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! It is great for chasing after kids at the beach or pool without feeling frumpy. The ruching makes it super flattering. I feel like I could house a cheeseburger and a pina colada and still wouldn't look bloated. I would call the backside coverage moderate, not full. It is not exactly cheeky but definitely not full coverage. I am normally a medium, ordered a size medium and small and ended up going with the small so I do suggest sizing down one. For reference I am 5'5 ,135lb, athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe82

customer_reviews.title: Super flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this swimsuit! I ordered it after I saw two other women wearing one. They were very different shapes than I am and than each other and it looked great on both of them. It fits great and is very flattering. One of the women is very busty with smallish bottom (she got a large) and the other is the opposite (she got an XL.) I am kind of medium build I guess. I normally wear about a 12 and the large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie712

customer_reviews.title: Must have swimsuit!!! Very flattering!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother & she absolutely loved it. I bought the large thinking it would run small but it was actually a tad big on her; moms five ft five’ish weighing in around 140’ish. She wore it this past weekend & got many compliments & even more from my dad :-) I’ll be buying myself one in red & she’ll undoubtedly want another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Supportive, and Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing swimsuit for the price. I am very large chested and usually have to spend an incredible amount to feel secure. I took this swimsuit on a beach vacation with my family and did not feel uncomfortable once. Additionally, I am 5'11", and the size medium fit great. It is also extremely flattering. The "tummy control" lends a very cute look to the waistline, and the amount of cleavage is perfect. I was very happy with my purchase. The only problem was that I got a small hole in the meshing of the back on the first wear, I must have snagged it or something. But, the hole did not grow at all during subsequent wears.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage but still sexy
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’ 7” and 160 lb. I have a very small chest 36A or 34B and very big butt and thighs. I am in anywhere from size 8 to size 12 jeans depending on the style. I have 1 year old triplets and needed a swimsuit for my new mom body. I ordered the medium, and it fits great everywhere. The ruching helps hide the post baby pooch. It has nice hiney coverage. And I feel like it will stay pretty secure with the boys hanging on me in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: KTWILD

customer_reviews.title: It's okay in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: This was super cute when I bought it in February but only a couple where's later it's rather stretched out. If your boobs are a little saggy and you need more support in general I wouldn't buy this. the chest stretched significantly and the padded bra doesn't really do anything to help. The sexy sheerness in the front was okay but overall would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: No breast support at all, not even a shelf bra! Also has moveable (not removable) cup liners which make your breasts look deformed. Too bad, because super cute swimsuit style otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: I L•O•V•E the suit!!! BUY THIS SUIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a LARGE and an XL in the colour black. I’m 45yrs old, 5’6, 140lbs and I’m a 38B. Tried the XL on first and it fit great. Tried the LARGE on second and it fit and looked FABULOUS!!! I read a ton of reviews before I made my purchase. The XL would of been okay but considering the stretching and swimming, I went with the LARGE bc it fits perfectly now and I know even when my weight fluctuates, it will still look fabulous. My husband and my 2 sisters said that it looked classy. It’s also my first onepiece and I’m so in love with it. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Surf1974

customer_reviews.title: Problem solver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium. I’m 5’4”, 134 lbs & carry more weight around my stomach area. It fits perfect & is a really cute, comfortable swimsuit. I am fairly flat chested & so tired of trying to tie swimsuits up as tight as possible to fit & make it actually look like I have cleavage. This swimsuit solves that. The mesh front keeps it held together without having gaping cups like other low cut styles I’ve tried. It fastens perfectly and feels secure. The mesh cutouts give it a sexier look than most 1 pieces. I ordered 2: wine red and white leaf pattern. Going to return the white one because it is a bit see through.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: White cups make it a 0/10
customer_reviews.text: So.. I loved it.. the fit, the look.. BUT the bright white rounded/triangular padding cups for the bra show right through the super thin material making you look just crazy. That really doesn’t show up in the picture, but it’s visible the moment you take it from the bag, and then put it on. If those were black, or if the material wasn’t so thin.. it would be a great suit.
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnaped

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: True confession: I got sucked into this bathing suit after falling for an ad trap on either facebook or instagram. I thought all the 5 star reviews can't be wrong. Worst case scenario, its Amazon and I send it back. Holy crap. This is my favorite bathing suit ever. It fits perfectly. Its so flattering, and makes me feel so confident when I'm walking around at the beach or on a cruise. If you're thinking about it, just buy it. I have an apple-shaped figure - larger tummy with love handles, and no defined waist (5'3, 135, 34DD). and a size 8 fit me like a glove. I ended up buying it in 2 more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but large.
customer_reviews.text: The High Neck Plunge Mesh Ruched Monokini is very nice, really good quality for the price. But size is way off. I am 5'6", 138lbs, 32DD, usually wearing a medium in most brands. Based on the reviews, I ordered a size S, but it is still too large. Granted I like my swimsuits on the tight side, holding me in, but still. Because I liked it, I am returning for an XS. Also, the brown is lighter in person (not bad at all, but I like the darker colors) so I am getting a different color. I gave it a 4 stars because of sizing, otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: V. A.

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a large. I preferred the way it fit everywhere except around the neck. Almost like it was to short and the part around the neck was pulling. So I returned and got an XL and it was perfect. I wore this for a recent cruise and it was great. I do not hand wash. I did gentle cycle and hang dry. So far it’s held up good. Swimsuit is very flattering and a lot more affordable then name brand similar suits.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits so cute. It’s so sad that the material is of such poor quality and the stitching is all over the place. I sent the first one back because after one wear the fibers started to fray and the mesh ran. So I requested a replacement. They clearly sent me a return bc the new item was stuffed in the bag, wrinkled to hell, and had dog/people hair on it. Not acceptable in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to be the one...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this swimsuit. I purchased two different sizes, praying one would be the perfect fit. Bad news though, none of them worked. I'm 5'9" and this suit just doesn't work if you're tall. Sized up and it still pulled terribly in the crotch area. No matter which way I maneuvered that suit, it just found a way to creep up in the most unflattering of ways. If you're shorter, this is a must have. If you're tall like me, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit had a HORRIBLE smell straight out of the bag. It fit everywhere but the chest area. This is not for large breasted ladies. Very cheaply made. It felt and sounded like it was ripping at the seams when I tried it on. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same style suit from 3 sellers to compare, so you don’t have to. I am 5’3”, 130lbs, size 4 dress, pear shape with 32D chest. I ordered the medium in all three to accommodate my hips and butt. The TemptMe brand was noticeably larger than the other two. I actually had fabric sticking out under my arms at the top bc it was so loose. The color is pretty and it would probably be flattering on someone with a much larger chest than mine. I could not order down though bc I think the bottom of the suit would be too tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lia'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this suit. It's cute, it's flattering, it's comfortable. I got several compliments when I wore it. I love that it's a one-piece so I feel secure for playing around in water parks, but also attractive so I don't feel shlumpy. I am 5’4” and about 135lbs, but I also have a short torso and a small-ish chest. I ordered two sizes (medium and large) after reading the reviews. The medium wound up fitting me perfect while the large was loose. If you are built like I am, I’d say go with your actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: great swimsuit - will buy in another color!
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate to find a swimsuit that had a higher neck. the halter tops and skinny straps just don't cut it. this was perfect, I wore it to the pool yesterday and it was GREAT. didn't have to worry about making sure my top was pulled up or any wardrobe malfunctions, ha! I ordered a large, my typical size - and it fits just fine. I'm not one to order clothes online without knowing how they fit. I read lots of reviews for this suit, checked the sizing, and went for it. So glad i did, planning on buying another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret 2012

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this suit, truthfully it looked great and was really comfortable (I personally hate halter tops the way they cut into my neck) so this was a great alternative--it just didn't fit awesome. Was ultimately too big and being plus size but with a smaller chest the top was just too loose on me. It might of fit better with a size down but I also wasn't in love with the cut on the legs, I wish it was a little lower. Everyone is different so I really just recommend getting the suit and see if it works for you, can always return is if doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Emt509

customer_reviews.title: GREAT suit, colors misleading
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this swimsuit but took off a star because the colors online are misleading. I bought the red because it looked like a deeper shade of my favorite color but it came and is such a bright red that I don’t like it (see picture). I am returning it and getting the black one because I love the suit and fit so much. I’m 5’7” and usually wear a size 10 and got the Large. It fit great, not tight but hugged my body. I’d definitely recommend this suit, just watch out for the color discrepancies.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sizes larger than I normally would based on the reviews that I read and the suit still doesn't fit. I am also upset that I did not find out in time to return the item as I was on vacation and now I am stuck with a swimsuit that doesn't fit. You should at least allow for Amazon credit or something if it is after 30 days. very unhappy Amazon customer right now!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia marker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good coverage without being homely
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this suit, I got compliments on it. It’s comfy too. The top is just a tad big, but it’s fine because of the mesh. It does a great job of hiding anything that is not 100% correctly “placed.” This is not a high cut suit at all, so it does not ride up your rear end. Makes for good coverage, but can cut in an unflattering way. Waist part is nice and flattering with the design. I think the mesh makes the suit. I hope it holds up. It’s a good suit for good coverage and comfort without being too homely. I would recommend and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Large fits great, I'm 5'8" roughly 160lbs. This fits perfectly in all areas. I probably could have sized up and still would have been comfortable with the fit, if I would be any bigger this would be a little snug. This suit is so flattering! Wish there was more designs and colors I'd own so many more!! Helps flatter the tummy area, there is padding in the bra area which is nice. The mesh mixed with the halter is enough to still make this suit feel sexy. Very classy and appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Kara McKee

product_meta.title: Tempt Me Women One Piece Swimsuit High Neck Plunge Mesh Ruched Monokini Swimwear
feature_bullets: High neck design with a padded push-up bra and neck hook closure provide support and shaping.
The see-through mesh style and deep plunge back design amp up the bathing suit, to be more charming, awesome, and chic.
The smooth fabric material is stretchy, comfortable, and soft, ensuring you will thoroughly enjoy wearing it. Note: Regular size: XS,S,M,L,XL. Plus Sizes: 14 Plus, 16 Plus, 18 Plus, 20 Plus.
The ruched pattern in the torso accentuates your curves and hides any imperfections perfectly while still being flattering.
This one piece swimsuit endows you a special feeling of confidence, beauty and joy in vacation, honeymoon, beach trip, pool party and various water activities.
